   20: -module(re_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   23: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2, pcre/1,compile_options/1,
   24: 	 run_options/1,combined_options/1,replace_autogen/1,
   25: 	 global_capture/1,replace_input_types/1,replace_with_fun/1,replace_return/1,
   26: 	 split_autogen/1,split_options/1,split_specials/1,
   27: 	 error_handling/1,pcre_cve_2008_2371/1,re_version/1,
   28: 	 pcre_compile_workspace_overflow/1,re_infinite_loop/1, 
   29: 	 re_backwards_accented/1,opt_dupnames/1,opt_all_names/1,inspect/1,
   30: 	 opt_no_start_optimize/1,opt_never_utf/1,opt_ucp/1,
   31: 	 match_limit/1,sub_binaries/1,copt/1,global_unicode_validation/1,
   32:          yield_on_subject_validation/1, bad_utf8_subject/1,
   33:          error_info/1]).
   34: 
   35: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   36: -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl").
   37: 
   38: suite() ->
   39:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   40:      {timetrap,{minutes,3}}].
   41: 
   42: all() -> 
   43:     [pcre, compile_options, run_options, combined_options,
   44:      replace_autogen, global_capture, replace_input_types,
   45:      replace_with_fun, replace_return, split_autogen, split_options,
   46:      split_specials, error_handling, pcre_cve_2008_2371,
   47:      pcre_compile_workspace_overflow, re_infinite_loop, 
   48:      re_backwards_accented, opt_dupnames, opt_all_names, 
   49:      inspect, opt_no_start_optimize,opt_never_utf,opt_ucp,
   50:      match_limit, sub_binaries, re_version, global_unicode_validation,
   51:      yield_on_subject_validation, bad_utf8_subject,
   52:      error_info].
   53: 
   54: groups() -> 
   55:     [].
   56: 
   57: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   58:     Config.
   59: 
   60: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   61:     ok.
   62: 
   63: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   64:     Config.
   65: 
   66: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   67:     Config.
   68: 
   69: 
   70: %% Run all applicable tests from the PCRE testsuites.
   71: pcre(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   72:     RootDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
   73:     Res = run_pcre_tests:test(RootDir),
   74:     0 = lists:sum([ X || {X,_,_} <- Res ]),
   75:     {comment,Res}.
   76: 
   77: %% Test all documented compile options.
   78: compile_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   79:     ok = ctest("ABDabcdABCD","abcd",[],true,{match,[{3,4}]}),
   80:     ok = ctest("ABDabcdABCD","abcd",[anchored],true,nomatch),
   81:     ok = ctest("ABDabcdABCD",".*abcd",[anchored],true,{match,[{0,7}]}),
   82:     ok = ctest("ABCabcdABC","ABCD",[],true,nomatch),
   83:     ok = ctest("ABCabcdABC","ABCD",[caseless],true,{match,[{3,4}]}),
   84:     ok = ctest("abcdABC\n","ABC$",[],true,{match,[{4,3}]}),
   85:     ok = ctest("abcdABC\n","ABC$",[dollar_endonly],true,nomatch),
   86:     ok = ctest("abcdABC\n","ABC.",[],true,nomatch),
   87:     ok = ctest("abcdABC\n","ABC.",[dotall],true,{match,[{4,4}]}),
   88:     ok = ctest("abcdABCD","ABC .",[],true,nomatch),
   89:     ok = ctest("abcdABCD","ABC .",[extended],true,{match,[{4,4}]}),
   90:     ok = ctest("abcd\nABCD","ABC",[],true,{match,[{5,3}]}),
   91:     ok = ctest("abcd\nABCD","ABC",[firstline],true,nomatch),
   92:     ok = ctest("abcd\nABCD","^ABC",[],true,nomatch),
   93:     ok = ctest("abcd\nABCD","^ABC",[multiline],true,{match,[{5,3}]}),
   94:     ok = ctest("abcdABCD","(ABC)",[],true,{match,[{4,3},{4,3}]}),
   95:     ok = ctest("abcdABCD","(ABC)",[no_auto_capture],true,{match,[{4,3}]}),
   96:     ok = ctest(notused,"(?<FOO>ABC)|(?<FOO>DEF)",[],false,notused),
   97:     ok = ctest("abcdABCD","(?<FOO>ABC)|(?<FOO>DEF)",[dupnames],true,{match,[{4,3},{4,3}]}),
   98:     ok = ctest("abcdABCDabcABCD","abcd.*D",[],true,{match,[{0,15}]}),
   99:     ok = ctest("abcdABCDabcABCD","abcd.*D",[ungreedy],true,{match,[{0,8}]}),
  100:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcABC\nD","abcd.*D",[],true,nomatch),
  101:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcABC\nD","abcd.*D",[{newline,cr}],true,{match,[{0,15}]}),
  102:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcABC\rD","abcd.*D",[],true,{match,[{0,15}]}),
  103:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcABC\rD","abcd.*D",[{newline,lf}],true,{match,[{0,15}]}),
  104:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[{newline,lf}],true,nomatch),
  105:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[{newline,cr}],true,nomatch),
  106:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[{newline,crlf}],true,{match,[{7,4}]}),
  107: 
  108:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcd\r","abcd$",[{newline,crlf}],true,nomatch),
  109:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcd\n","abcd$",[{newline,crlf}],true,nomatch),
  110:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf}],true,{match,[{7,4}]}),
  111: 
  112:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcd\r","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf}],true,{match,[{7,4}]}),
  113:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcd\n","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf}],true,{match,[{7,4}]}),
  114:     ok.
  115: 
  116: %% Test all documented run specific options.
  117: run_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  118:     rtest("ABCabcdABC","abc",[],[],true),
  119:     rtest("ABCabcdABC","abc",[anchored],[],false),
  120:     %% Anchored in run overrides unanchored in compilation
  121:     rtest("ABCabcdABC","abc",[],[anchored],false),
  122: 
  123:     rtest("","a?b?",[],[],true),
  124:     rtest("","a?b?",[],[notempty],false),
  125: 
  126:     rtest("abc","^a",[],[],true),
  127:     rtest("abc","^a",[],[notbol],false),
  128:     rtest("ab\nc","^a",[multiline],[],true),
  129:     rtest("ab\nc","^a",[multiline],[notbol],false),
  130:     rtest("ab\nc","^c",[multiline],[notbol],true),
  131: 
  132:     rtest("abc","c$",[],[],true),
  133:     rtest("abc","c$",[],[noteol],false),
  134: 
  135:     rtest("ab\nc","b$",[multiline],[],true),
  136:     rtest("ab\nc","c$",[multiline],[],true),
  137:     rtest("ab\nc","b$",[multiline],[noteol],true),
  138:     rtest("ab\nc","c$",[multiline],[noteol],false),
  139: 
  140:     rtest("abc","ab",[],[{offset,0}],true),
  141:     rtest("abc","ab",[],[{offset,1}],false),
  142: 
  143:     rtest("abcdABCabcABC\nD","abcd.*D",[],[],false),
  144:     rtest("abcdABCabcABC\nD","abcd.*D",[],[{newline,cr}],true),
  145:     rtest("abcdABCabcABC\rD","abcd.*D",[],[],true),
  146:     rtest("abcdABCabcABC\rD","abcd.*D",[{newline,cr}],[{newline,lf}],true),
  147:     rtest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[],[{newline,lf}],false),
  148:     rtest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[],[{newline,cr}],false),
  149:     rtest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[],[{newline,crlf}],true),
  150: 
  151:     rtest("abcdABCabcd\r","abcd$",[],[{newline,crlf}],false),
  152:     rtest("abcdABCabcd\n","abcd$",[],[{newline,crlf}],false),
  153:     rtest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[],[{newline,anycrlf}],true),
  154: 
  155:     rtest("abcdABCabcd\r","abcd$",[],[{newline,anycrlf}],true),
  156:     rtest("abcdABCabcd\n","abcd$",[],[{newline,anycrlf}],true),
  157: 
  158:     {ok,MP} = re:compile(".*(abcd).*"),
  159:     {match,[{0,10},{3,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[]),
  160:     {match,[{0,10},{3,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,all}]),
  161:     {match,[{0,10},{3,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,all,index}]),
  162:     {match,["ABCabcdABC","abcd"]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,all,list}]),
  163:     {match,[<<"ABCabcdABC">>,<<"abcd">>]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,all,binary}]),
  164:     {match,[{0,10}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,first}]),
  165:     {match,[{0,10}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,first,index}]),       {match,["ABCabcdABC"]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,first,list}]),
  166:     {match,[<<"ABCabcdABC">>]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,first,binary}]),
  167: 
  168:     {match,[{3,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,all_but_first}]),
  169:     {match,[{3,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,all_but_first,index}]),
  170:     {match,["abcd"]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,all_but_first,list}]),
  171:     {match,[<<"abcd">>]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,all_but_first,binary}]),
  172: 
  173:     match = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,none}]),
  174:     match = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,none,index}]),
  175:     match = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,none,list}]),
  176:     match = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,none,binary}]),
  177: 
  178:     {ok,MP2} = re:compile(".*(?<FOO>abcd).*"),
  179:     {match,[{3,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP2,[{capture,[1]}]),
  180:     {match,[{3,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP2,[{capture,['FOO']}]),
  181:     {match,[{3,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP2,[{capture,["FOO"]}]),
  182:     {match,["abcd"]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP2,[{capture,["FOO"],list}]),
  183:     {match,[<<"abcd">>]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP2,[{capture,["FOO"],binary}]),
  184: 
  185:     {match,[{-1,0}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP2,[{capture,[200]}]),
  186:     {match,[{-1,0}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP2,[{capture,['BAR']}]),
  187:     {match,[""]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP2,[{capture,[200],list}]),
  188:     {match,[""]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP2,[{capture,['BAR'],list}]),
  189:     {match,[<<>>]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP2,[{capture,[200],binary}]),
  190:     {match,[<<>>]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP2,[{capture,['BAR'],binary}]),
  191: 
  192:     {ok, MP3} = re:compile(".*((?<FOO>abdd)|a(..d)).*"),
  193:     {match,[{0,10},{3,4},{-1,0},{4,3}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP3,[]),
  194:     {match,[{0,10},{3,4},{-1,0},{4,3}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP3,[{capture,all,index}]),
  195:     {match,[<<"ABCabcdABC">>,<<"abcd">>,<<>>,<<"bcd">>]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP3,[{capture,all,binary}]),
  196:     {match,["ABCabcdABC","abcd",[],"bcd"]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP3,[{capture,all,list}]),
  197:     ok.
  198: 
  199: 
  200: 
  201: %% Test the version is retorned correctly
  202: re_version(_Config) ->
  203:     Version = re:version(),
  204:     {match,[Version]} = re:run(Version,"^[0-9]\\.[0-9]{2} 20[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{2}",[{capture,all,binary}]),
  205:     ok.
  206: 
  207: global_unicode_validation(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  208:     %% Test that unicode validation of the subject is not done
  209:     %% for every match found...
  210:     Bin = binary:copy(<<"abc\n">>,100000),
  211:     {TimeAscii, _} = take_time(fun () ->
  212:                                        re:run(Bin, <<"b">>, [global])
  213:                                end),
  214:     {TimeUnicode, _} = take_time(fun () ->
  215:                                          re:run(Bin, <<"b">>, [unicode,global])
  216:                                  end),
  217:     if TimeAscii == 0; TimeUnicode == 0 ->
  218:             {comment, "Not good enough resolution to compare results"};
  219:        true ->
  220:             %% The time the operations takes should be in the
  221:             %% same order of magnitude. If validation of the
  222:             %% whole subject occurs for every match, the unicode
  223:             %% variant will take way longer time...
  224:             true = TimeUnicode div TimeAscii < 10
  225:     end.
  226: 
  227: take_time(Fun) ->
  228:     Start = erlang:monotonic_time(nanosecond),
  229:     Res = Fun(),
  230:     End = erlang:monotonic_time(nanosecond),
  231:     {End-Start, Res}.
  232: 
  233: yield_on_subject_validation(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  234:     Go = make_ref(),
  235:     Bin = binary:copy(<<"abc\n">>,100000),
  236:     {P, M} = spawn_opt(fun () ->
  237:                                receive Go -> ok end,
  238:                                {match,[{1,1}]} = re:run(Bin, <<"b">>, [unicode])
  239:                        end,
  240:                        [link, monitor]),
  241:     1 = erlang:trace(P, true, [running]),
  242:     P ! Go,
  243:     N = count_re_run_trap_out(P, M),
  244:     true = N >= 5,
  245:     ok.
  246: 
  247: count_re_run_trap_out(P, M) when is_reference(M) ->
  248:     receive {'DOWN',M,process,P,normal} -> ok end,
  249:     TD = erlang:trace_delivered(P),
  250:     receive {trace_delivered, P, TD} -> ok end,
  251:     count_re_run_trap_out(P, 0);
  252: count_re_run_trap_out(P, N) when is_integer(N) ->
  253:     receive
  254:         {trace,P,out,{erlang,re_run_trap,3}} ->
  255:             count_re_run_trap_out(P, N+1)
  256:     after 0 ->
  257:             N
  258:     end.
  259: 
  260: %% Test compile options given directly to run.
  261: combined_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  262:     ok = crtest("ABDabcdABCD","abcd",[],true,{match,[{3,4}]}),
  263:     ok = crtest("ABDabcdABCD","abcd",[anchored],true,nomatch),
  264:     ok = crtest("ABDabcdABCD",".*abcd",[anchored],true,{match,[{0,7}]}),
  265:     ok = crtest("ABCabcdABC","ABCD",[],true,nomatch),
  266:     ok = crtest("ABCabcdABC","ABCD",[caseless],true,{match,[{3,4}]}),
  267:     ok = crtest("abcdABC\n","ABC$",[],true,{match,[{4,3}]}),
  268:     ok = crtest("abcdABC\n","ABC$",[dollar_endonly],true,nomatch),
  269:     ok = crtest("abcdABC\n","ABC.",[],true,nomatch),
  270:     ok = crtest("abcdABC\n","ABC.",[dotall],true,{match,[{4,4}]}),
  271:     ok = crtest("abcdABCD","ABC .",[],true,nomatch),
  272:     ok = crtest("abcdABCD","ABC .",[extended],true,{match,[{4,4}]}),
  273:     ok = crtest("abcd\nABCD","ABC",[],true,{match,[{5,3}]}),
  274:     ok = crtest("abcd\nABCD","ABC",[firstline],true,nomatch),
  275:     ok = crtest("abcd\nABCD","^ABC",[],true,nomatch),
  276:     ok = crtest("abcd\nABCD","^ABC",[multiline],true,{match,[{5,3}]}),
  277:     ok = crtest("abcdABCD","(ABC)",[],true,{match,[{4,3},{4,3}]}),
  278:     ok = crtest("abcdABCD","(ABC)",[no_auto_capture],true,{match,[{4,3}]}),
  279:     ok = crtest(notused,"(?<FOO>ABC)|(?<FOO>DEF)",[],false,notused),
  280:     ok = crtest("abcdABCD","(?<FOO>ABC)|(?<FOO>DEF)",[dupnames],true,{match,[{4,3},{4,3}]}),
  281:     ok = crtest("abcdABCDabcABCD","abcd.*D",[],true,{match,[{0,15}]}),
  282:     ok = crtest("abcdABCDabcABCD","abcd.*D",[ungreedy],true,{match,[{0,8}]}),
  283:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcABC\nD","abcd.*D",[],true,nomatch),
  284:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcABC\nD","abcd.*D",[{newline,cr}],true,{match,[{0,15}]}),
  285:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcABC\rD","abcd.*D",[],true,{match,[{0,15}]}),
  286:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcABC\rD","abcd.*D",[{newline,lf}],true,{match,[{0,15}]}),
  287:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[{newline,lf}],true,nomatch),
  288:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[{newline,cr}],true,nomatch),
  289:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[{newline,crlf}],true,{match,[{7,4}]}),
  290: 
  291:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\r","abcd$",[{newline,crlf}],true,nomatch),
  292:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\n","abcd$",[{newline,crlf}],true,nomatch),
  293:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf}],true,{match,[{7,4}]}),
  294: 
  295:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\r","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf}],true,{match,[{7,4}]}),
  296:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\n","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf}],true,{match,[{7,4}]}),
  297: 
  298:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf},{capture,all,list}],true,{match,["abcd"]}),
  299: 
  300:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\r","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf},{capture,all,list}],true,{match,["abcd"]}),
  301: 
  302:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\n","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf},{capture,all,list}],true,{match,["abcd"]}),
  303: 
  304:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf},{capture,all,binary}],true,{match,[<<"abcd">>]}),
  305: 
  306:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\r","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf},{capture,all,binary}],true,{match,[<<"abcd">>]}),
  307:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\n","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf},{capture,all,binary}],true,{match,[<<"abcd">>]}),
  308: 
  309:     %% Check that unique run-options fail in compile only case:
  310:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:compile("abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf},{capture,all,binary}])),
  311:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:compile("abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf},{offset,3}])),
  312:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:compile("abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf},notempty])),
  313:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:compile("abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf},notbol])),
  314:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:compile("abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf},noteol])),
  315: 
  316: 
  317:     {match,_} = re:run("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[{newline,crlf}]),
  318:     nomatch = re:run("abcdABCabcd\r\nefgh","abcd$",[{newline,crlf}]),
  319:     {match,_} = re:run("abcdABCabcd\r\nefgh","abcd$",[{newline,crlf},multiline]),
  320:     nomatch = re:run("abcdABCabcd\r\nefgh","efgh$",[{newline,crlf},multiline,noteol]),
  321:     {match,_} = re:run("abcdABCabcd\r\nefgh","abcd$",[{newline,crlf},multiline,noteol]),
  322:     {match,_} = re:run("abcdABCabcd\r\nefgh","^abcd",[{newline,crlf},multiline,noteol]),
  323:     nomatch = re:run("abcdABCabcd\r\nefgh","^abcd",[{newline,crlf},multiline,notbol]),
  324:     {match,_} = re:run("abcdABCabcd\r\nefgh","^efgh",[{newline,crlf},multiline,notbol]),
  325:     {match,_} = re:run("ABC\nD","[a-z]*",[{newline,crlf}]),
  326:     nomatch = re:run("ABC\nD","[a-z]*",[{newline,crlf},notempty]),
  327:     ok.
  328: 
  329: %% Test replace with autogenerated erlang module.
  330: replace_autogen(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  331:     re_testoutput1_replacement_test:run(),
  332:     ok.
  333: 
  334: %% Test capture options together with global searching.
  335: global_capture(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  336:     {match,[{3,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",".*(?<FOO>abcd).*",[{capture,[1]}]),
  337:     {match,[{10,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA",".*(?<FOO>abcd).*",[{capture,[1]}]),
  338:     {match,[[{10,4}]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA",".*(?<FOO>abcd).*",[global,{capture,[1]}]),
  339:     {match,[{3,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",".*(?<FOO>abcd).*",[{capture,['FOO']}]),
  340:     {match,[{10,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA",".*(?<FOO>abcd).*",[{capture,['FOO']}]),
  341:     {match,[[{10,4}]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA",".*(?<FOO>abcd).*",[global,{capture,['FOO']}]),
  342:     {match,[[{3,4},{3,4}],[{10,4},{10,4}]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","(?<FOO>abcd)",[global]),
  343:     {match,[[{3,4},{3,4}],[{10,4},{10,4}]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","(?<FOO>abcd)",[global,{capture,all}]),
  344:     {match,[[{3,4},{3,4}],[{10,4},{10,4}]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","(?<FOO>abcd)",[global,{capture,all,index}]),
  345:     {match,[[{3,4}],[{10,4}]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","(?<FOO>abcd)",[global,{capture,first}]),
  346:     {match,[[{3,4}],[{10,4}]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","(?<FOO>abcd)",[global,{capture,all_but_first}]),
  347:     {match,[[<<"bcd">>],[<<"bcd">>]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,all_but_first,binary}]),
  348:     {match,[["bcd"],["bcd"]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,all_but_first,list}]),
  349:     {match,[["abcd","bcd"],["abcd","bcd"]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,all,list}]),
  350:     {match,[[<<"abcd">>,<<"bcd">>],[<<"abcd">>,<<"bcd">>]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,all,binary}]),
  351:     {match,[[{3,4},{4,3}],[{10,4},{11,3}]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,all,index}]),
  352:     match = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,none,index}]),
  353:     match = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,none,binary}]),
  354:     match = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,none,list}]),
  355:     {match,[[<<195,133,98,99,100>>,<<"bcd">>],[<<"abcd">>,<<"bcd">>]]} = re:run("ABCÅbcdABCabcdA",".(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,all,binary},unicode]),
  356:     {match,[["Åbcd","bcd"],["abcd","bcd"]]} = re:run(<<"ABC",8#303,8#205,"bcdABCabcdA">>,".(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,all,list},unicode]),
  357:     {match,[["Åbcd","bcd"],["abcd","bcd"]]} = re:run("ABCÅbcdABCabcdA",".(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,all,list},unicode]),
  358:     {match,[[{3,5},{5,3}],[{11,4},{12,3}]]} = re:run("ABCÅbcdABCabcdA",".(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,all,index},unicode]),
  359:     ok.
  360: 
  361: %% Test replace with different input types.
  362: replace_input_types(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  363:     <<"abcd">> = re:replace("abcd","Z","X",[{return,binary},unicode]),
  364:     <<"abcd">> = re:replace("abcd","\x{400}","X",[{return,binary},unicode]),
  365:     <<"a",208,128,"cd">> = re:replace(<<"abcd">>,"b","\x{400}",[{return,binary},unicode]),
  366:     ok.
  367: 
  368: %% Test replace with a replacement function.
  369: replace_with_fun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  370:     <<"ABCD">> = re:replace("abcd", ".", fun(<<C>>, []) -> <<(C - $a + $A)>> end, [global, {return, binary}]),
  371:     <<"AbCd">> = re:replace("abcd", ".", fun(<<C>>, []) when (C - $a) rem 2 =:= 0 -> <<(C - $a + $A)>>; (C, []) -> C end, [global, {return, binary}]),
  372:     <<"b-ad-c">> = re:replace("abcd", "(.)(.)", fun(_, [A, B]) -> <<B/binary, $-, A/binary>> end, [global, {return, binary}]),
  373:     <<"#ab-B#cd">> = re:replace("abcd", ".(.)", fun(Whole, [<<C>>]) -> <<$#, Whole/binary, $-, (C - $a + $A), $#>> end, [{return, binary}]),
  374:     <<"#ab#cd">> = re:replace("abcd", ".(x)?(.)", fun(Whole, [<<>>, _]) -> <<$#, Whole/binary, $#>> end, [{return, binary}]),
  375:     <<"#ab#cd">> = re:replace("abcd", ".(.)(x)?", fun(Whole, [_]) -> <<$#, Whole/binary, $#>> end, [{return, binary}]),
  376:     ok.
  377: 
  378: %% Test return options of replace together with global searching.
  379: replace_return(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  380:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:replace("na","(a","")),
  381:     ok = replacetest(<<"nisse">>,"i","a",[{return,binary}],<<"nasse">>),
  382:     ok = replacetest("ABC\305abcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)","X",[global,{return,binary}],<<"ABCÅXABCXA">>),
  383:     ok = replacetest("ABCÅabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)","X",[global,{return,iodata}],[<<"ABCÅ">>,<<"X">>,<<"ABC">>,<<"X">>|<<"A">>]),
  384:     ok = replacetest("ABCÅabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)","X",[global,{return,list},unicode],"ABCÅXABCXA"),
  385:     ok = replacetest("ABCÅabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)","X",[global,{return,binary},unicode],<<65,66,67,195,133,88,65,66,67,88,65>>),
  386:     ok = replacetest("ABCÅabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)","X",[{return,binary},unicode],<<65,66,67,195,133,88,65,66,67,97,98,99,100,65>>),
  387:     ok = replacetest("abcdefghijk","(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)","\\9X",[{return,binary}],<<"iXk">>),
  388:     ok = replacetest("abcdefghijk","(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)","\\10X",[{return,binary}],<<"jXk">>),
  389:     ok = replacetest("abcdefghijk","(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)","\\11X",[{return,binary}],<<"Xk">>),
  390:     ok = replacetest("12345678901","(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)","\\g9X",[{return,binary}],<<"9X1">>),
  391:     ok = replacetest("12345678901","(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)","\\g10X",[{return,binary}],<<"0X1">>),
  392:     ok = replacetest("12345678901","(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)","\\g11X",[{return,binary}],<<"X1">>),
  393:     ok = replacetest("12345678901","(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)","\\g{9}7",[{return,binary}],<<"971">>),
  394:     ok = replacetest("12345678901","(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)","\\g{10}7",[{return,binary}],<<"071">>),
  395:     ok = replacetest("12345678901","(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)","\\g{11}7",[{return,binary}],<<"71">>),
  396:     ok = replacetest("a\x{400}bcd","d","X",[global,{return,list},unicode],"a\x{400}bcX"),
  397:     ok = replacetest("a\x{400}bcd","d","X",[global,{return,binary},unicode],<<"a",208,128,"bcX">>),
  398:     ok = replacetest("a\x{400}bcd","Z","X",[global,{return,list},unicode],"a\x{400}bcd"),
  399:     ok = replacetest("a\x{400}bcd","Z","X",[global,{return,binary},unicode],<<"a",208,128,"bcd">>),
  400:     ok.
  401: 
  402: rtest(Subj, RE, Copt, Ropt, true) ->
  403:     {ok,MP} = re:compile(RE,Copt), 
  404:     {match,_} = re:run(Subj,MP,Ropt),
  405:     ok;
  406: rtest(Subj, RE, Copt, Ropt, false) ->
  407:     {ok,MP} = re:compile(RE,Copt), 
  408:     nomatch = re:run(Subj,MP,Ropt),
  409:     ok.
  410: 
  411: ctest(_,RE,Options,false,_) ->
  412:     case re:compile(RE,Options) of
  413: 	{ok,_} ->
  414: 	    error;
  415: 	{error,_} ->
  416: 	    ok
  417:     end;
  418: ctest(Subject,RE,Options,true,Result) ->
  419:     try
  420: 	{ok, Prog} = re:compile(RE,Options),
  421: 	Result = re:run(Subject,Prog,[]),
  422: 	ok
  423:     catch
  424: 	_:_ ->
  425: 	    error
  426:     end.
  427: crtest(_,RE,Options,false,_) ->
  428:     case (catch re:run("",RE,Options)) of
  429: 	{'EXIT',{badarg,_}} ->
  430: 	    ok;
  431: 	_ ->
  432: 	    error
  433:     end;
  434: crtest(Subject,RE,Options,true,Result) ->
  435:     try
  436: 	Result = re:run(Subject,RE,Options),
  437: 	ok
  438:     catch
  439: 	_:_ ->
  440: 	    error
  441:     end.
  442: 
  443: replacetest(Subject,RE,Replacement,Options,Result) ->
  444:     Result = re:replace(Subject,RE,Replacement,Options),
  445:     {CompileOptions,ReplaceOptions} = lists:partition(fun copt/1, Options),
  446:     {ok,MP} = re:compile(RE,CompileOptions),
  447:     Result = re:replace(Subject,MP,Replacement,ReplaceOptions),
  448:     ok.
  449: 
  450: splittest(Subject,RE,Options,Result) ->
  451:     Result = re:split(Subject,RE,Options),
  452:     {CompileOptions,SplitOptions} = lists:partition(fun copt/1, Options),
  453:     {ok,MP} = re:compile(RE,CompileOptions),
  454:     Result = re:split(Subject,MP,SplitOptions),
  455:     ok.
  456: 
  457: copt(caseless) -> true;
  458: copt(no_start_optimize) -> true;
  459: copt(never_utf) -> true;
  460: copt(ucp) -> true;
  461: copt(dollar_endonly) -> true;
  462: copt(dotall) -> true;
  463: copt(extended) -> true;
  464: copt(firstline) -> true;
  465: copt(multiline) -> true;
  466: copt(no_auto_capture) -> true;
  467: copt(dupnames) -> true;
  468: copt(ungreedy) -> true;
  469: copt(unicode) -> true;
  470: copt(_) -> false.
  471: 
  472: %% Test split with autogenerated erlang module.
  473: split_autogen(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  474:     re_testoutput1_split_test:run(),
  475:     ok.
  476: 
  477: %% Test special options to split.
  478: split_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  479:     ok = splittest("a b c ","( )",[group,trim],[[<<"a">>,<<" ">>],[<<"b">>,<<" ">>],[<<"c">>,<<" ">>]]),
  480:     ok = splittest("a b c ","( )",[group,{parts,0}],[[<<"a">>,<<" ">>],[<<"b">>,<<" ">>],[<<"c">>,<<" ">>]]),
  481:     ok = splittest("a b c ","( )",[{parts,infinity},group],[[<<"a">>,<<" ">>],[<<"b">>,<<" ">>],[<<"c">>,<<" ">>],[<<>>]]),
  482:     ok = splittest("a b c ","( )",[group],[[<<"a">>,<<" ">>],[<<"b">>,<<" ">>],[<<"c">>,<<" ">>],[<<>>]]),
  483:     ok = splittest(" a b c d ","( +)",[group,trim],[[<<>>,<<" ">>],[<<"a">>,<<" ">>],[<<"b">>,<<" ">>],[<<"c">>,<<" ">>],[<<"d">>,<<" ">>]]),
  484:     ok = splittest(" a b c d ","( +)",[{parts,0},group],[[<<>>,<<" ">>],[<<"a">>,<<" ">>],[<<"b">>,<<" ">>],[<<"c">>,<<" ">>],[<<"d">>,<<" ">>]]),
  485:     ok = splittest(" a b c d ","( +)",[{parts,infinity},group],[[<<>>,<<" ">>],[<<"a">>,<<" ">>],[<<"b">>,<<" ">>],[<<"c">>,<<" ">>],[<<"d">>,<<" ">>],[<<>>]]),
  486:     ok = splittest("a b c d","( +)",[{parts,2},group],[[<<"a">>,<<" ">>],[<<"b c d">>]]),
  487:     ok = splittest([967]++" b c d","( +)",[{parts,2},group,{return,list},unicode],[[[967]," "],["b c d"]]),
  488:     ok = splittest([967]++" b c d","( +)",[{parts,2},group,{return,binary},unicode],[[<<207,135>>,<<" ">>],[<<"b c d">>]]),
  489:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:split([967]++" b c d","( +)",[{parts,2},group,{return,binary}])),
  490:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:split("a b c d","( +)",[{parts,-2}])),
  491:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:split("a b c d","( +)",[{parts,banan}])),
  492:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:split("a b c d","( +)",[{capture,all}])),
  493:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:split("a b c d","( +)",[{capture,[],binary}])),
  494:     %% Parts 0 is equal to no parts specification (implicit strip)
  495:     ok = splittest("a b c d","( *)",[{parts,0},{return,list}],["a"," ","b"," ","c"," ","d"]),
  496:     ok.
  497: 
  498: join([]) -> [];
  499: join([A]) -> [A];
  500: join([H|T]) -> [H,<<":">>|join(T)].
  501: 
  502: %% Some special cases of split that are easy to get wrong.
  503: split_specials(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  504:     %% More or less just to remember these icky cases
  505:     <<"::abd:f">> =
  506: 	iolist_to_binary(join(re:split("abdf","^(?!(ab)de|x)(abd)(f)",[trim]))),
  507:     <<":abc2xyzabc3">> =
  508: 	iolist_to_binary(join(re:split("abc1abc2xyzabc3","\\Aabc.",[trim]))),
  509:     ok.
  510: 
  511: 
  512: %% Test that errors are handled correctly by the erlang code.
  513: error_handling(_Config) ->
  514:     %% This test checks the exception tuples manufactured in the erlang
  515:     %% code to hide the trapping from the user at least when it comes to errors
  516: 
  517:     %% The malformed precomiled RE is detected after
  518:     %% the trap to re:grun from grun, in the grun function clause
  519:     %% that handles precompiled expressions
  520:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,run,["apa",{1,2,3,4},[global]],_},
  521:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  522: 	(catch re:run("apa",{1,2,3,4},[global])),
  523:     %% An invalid capture list will also cause a badarg late,
  524:     %% but with a non pre compiled RE, the exception should be thrown by the
  525:     %% grun function clause that handles RE's compiled implicitly by
  526:     %% the run/3 BIF before trapping.
  527:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,run,["apa","p",[{capture,[1,{a}]},global]],_},
  528:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  529: 	(catch re:run("apa","p",[{capture,[1,{a}]},global])),
  530:     %% And so the case of a precompiled expression together with
  531:     %% a compile-option (binary and list subject):
  532:     {ok,RE} = re:compile("(p)"),
  533:     {match,[[{1,1},{1,1}]]} = re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[global]),
  534:     {match,[[{1,1},{1,1}]]} = re:run("apa",RE,[global]),
  535:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,run,
  536: 		      [<<"apa">>,
  537: 		       {re_pattern,1,0,_,_},
  538: 		       [global,unicode]],_},
  539:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  540: 	(catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[global,unicode])),
  541:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,run,
  542: 		      ["apa",
  543: 		       {re_pattern,1,0,_,_},
  544: 		       [global,unicode]],_},
  545:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  546: 	(catch re:run("apa",RE,[global,unicode])),
  547:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run("apa","(p",[])),
  548:     {error, {compile, {_,_}}} = re:run("apa","(p",[report_errors]),
  549:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run("apa","(p",[global])),
  550:     {error, {compile, {_,_}}} = re:run("apa","(p",[report_errors,global]),
  551:     %% Badly formed options
  552:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,["global"])),
  553:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[{offset,-1}])),
  554:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[{offset,ett}])),
  555:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[{captore,[1,2],binary}])),
  556:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[{capture,[1,2],binary,list}])),
  557:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[{capture,[1,2],bunary}])),
  558:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[{capture,{1,2},binary}])),
  559:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[{newline,3}])),
  560:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[{newline,apa}])),
  561:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[{njuline,cr}])),
  562:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[{<<"newline">>,cr}])),
  563:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[global|dupnames])),
  564:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run([<<"ap">>|$a],RE,[])), % Not an IO-list
  565:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:compile([<<"ap">>|$a],[])), % Not an IO-list
  566:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[{capture,[0|1],binary}])),
  567:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,
  568: 					[{capture,[<<"apa">>|1],binary}])), 
  569:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,
  570: 					[{capture,[[<<"ap">>|$a]],binary}])), 
  571:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,[<<"(p">>|41],[])), 
  572:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,{re_pattern,3,0,0,[]},[])),
  573:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,{re_pattern,3,0,0,<<"apa">>},[])),
  574:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,{re_pattern,3,0,0,<<"apa",3:2>>},[])),
  575:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa",2:2>>,<<"(p)">>,[{capture,[0,1],binary}])), 
  576:     <<_:4,Temp:3/binary,_:4>> = <<38,23,6,18>>,
  577:     {match,[{1,1},{1,1}]} = re:run(Temp,<<"(p)">>,[]), % Unaligned works 
  578:     %% The replace errors:
  579:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,replace,["apa",{1,2,3,4},"X",[]],_},
  580:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  581: 	(catch re:replace("apa",{1,2,3,4},"X",[])),
  582:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,replace,["apa",{1,2,3,4},"X",[global]],_},
  583:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  584: 	(catch re:replace("apa",{1,2,3,4},"X",[global])),
  585:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,replace,
  586: 		      ["apa",
  587: 		       {re_pattern,1,0,_,_},
  588: 		       "X",
  589: 		       [unicode]],_},
  590:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  591: 	(catch re:replace("apa",RE,"X",[unicode])),
  592:     <<"aXa">> = iolist_to_binary(re:replace("apa","p","X",[])),
  593:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,replace,
  594: 		      ["apa","p","X",[report_errors]],_},
  595:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  596: 	(catch iolist_to_binary(re:replace("apa","p","X",
  597: 					   [report_errors]))),
  598:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,replace,
  599: 		      ["apa","p","X",[{capture,all,binary}]],_},
  600:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  601: 	(catch iolist_to_binary(re:replace("apa","p","X",
  602: 					   [{capture,all,binary}]))),
  603:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,replace,
  604: 		      ["apa","p","X",[{capture,all}]],_},
  605:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  606: 	(catch iolist_to_binary(re:replace("apa","p","X",
  607: 					   [{capture,all}]))),
  608:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,replace,
  609: 		      ["apa","p","X",[{return,banana}]],_},
  610:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  611: 	(catch iolist_to_binary(re:replace("apa","p","X",
  612: 					   [{return,banana}]))),
  613:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:replace("apa","(p","X",[])),
  614:     %% Badarg, not compile error.
  615:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,replace,
  616: 		      ["apa","(p","X",[{return,banana}]],_},
  617:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  618: 	(catch iolist_to_binary(re:replace("apa","(p","X",
  619: 					   [{return,banana}]))),
  620:     %% And the split errors:
  621:     [<<"a">>,<<"a">>] = (catch re:split("apa","p",[])),
  622:     [<<"a">>,<<"p">>,<<"a">>] = (catch re:split("apa",RE,[])),
  623:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,split,["apa","p",[report_errors]],_},
  624:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  625: 	(catch re:split("apa","p",[report_errors])),
  626:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,split,["apa","p",[global]],_},
  627:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  628: 	(catch re:split("apa","p",[global])),
  629:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,split,["apa","p",[{capture,all}]],_},
  630:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  631: 	(catch re:split("apa","p",[{capture,all}])),
  632:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,split,["apa","p",[{capture,all,binary}]],_},
  633:                      {?MODULE, ?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  634: 	(catch re:split("apa","p",[{capture,all,binary}])),
  635:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,split,["apa",{1,2,3,4}],_},
  636:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  637: 	(catch re:split("apa",{1,2,3,4})),
  638:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,split,["apa",{1,2,3,4},[]],_},
  639:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  640: 	(catch re:split("apa",{1,2,3,4},[])),
  641:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,split,
  642: 		      ["apa",
  643: 		       RE,
  644: 		       [unicode]],_},
  645:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  646: 	(catch re:split("apa",RE,[unicode])),
  647:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,split,
  648: 		      ["apa",
  649: 		       RE,
  650: 		       [{return,banana}]],_},
  651:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  652: 	(catch re:split("apa",RE,[{return,banana}])),
  653:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,split,
  654: 		      ["apa",
  655: 		       RE,
  656: 		       [banana]],_},
  657:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  658: 	(catch re:split("apa",RE,[banana])),
  659:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:split("apa","(p")),
  660:     %%Exception on bad argument, not compilation error
  661:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,split,
  662: 		      ["apa",
  663: 		       "(p",
  664: 		       [banana]],_},
  665:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  666: 	(catch re:split("apa","(p",[banana])),
  667:     ok.
  668: 
  669: %% Fix as in http://vcs.pcre.org/viewvc?revision=360&view=revision
  670: pcre_cve_2008_2371(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  671:     %% Make sure it doesn't crash the emulator.
  672:     re:compile(<<"(?i)[\xc3\xa9\xc3\xbd]|[\xc3\xa9\xc3\xbdA]">>, [unicode]),
  673:     ok.
  674: 
  675: %% Patch from
  676: %% http://vcs.pcre.org/viewvc/code/trunk/pcre_compile.c?r1=504&r2=505&view=patch
  677: pcre_compile_workspace_overflow(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  678:     N = 819,
  679:     ExpStr = "Got expected error: ",
  680:     case re:compile([lists:duplicate(N, $(), lists:duplicate(N, $))]) of
  681:         {error, {"regular expression is too complicated" = Str,799}} ->
  682:             {comment, ExpStr ++ Str};
  683:         {error, {"parentheses are too deeply nested (stack check)" = Str, _No}} ->
  684:             {comment, ExpStr ++ Str};
  685:         Other ->
  686:             ct:fail({unexpected, Other})
  687:     end.
  688: 
  689: %% Make sure matches that really loop infinitely actually fail.
  690: re_infinite_loop(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  691:     Str =
  692:         "http:/www.flickr.com/slideShow/index.gne?group_id=&user_id=69845378@N0",
  693:     EMail_regex = "[a-z0-9!#$%&'*+/=?^_`{|}~-]+"
  694:         ++ "(\.[a-z0-9!#$%&'*+/=?^_`{|}~-]+)*"
  695:         ++ "@.*([a-z0-9](?:[a-z0-9-]*[a-z0-9])?\.)+"
  696:         ++ "([a-zA-Z]{2}|com|org|net|gov|mil"
  697:         ++ "|biz|info|mobi|name|aero|jobs|museum)",
  698:     nomatch = re:run(Str, EMail_regex),
  699:     nomatch = re:run(Str, EMail_regex, [global]),
  700:     {error,match_limit} = re:run(Str, EMail_regex,[report_errors]),
  701:     {error,match_limit} = re:run(Str, EMail_regex,[report_errors,global]),
  702:     ok.
  703: 
  704: %% Check for nasty bug where accented graphemes can make PCRE back
  705: %% past beginning of subject.
  706: re_backwards_accented(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  707:     match = re:run(<<65,204,128,65,204,128,97,98,99>>,
  708: 		   <<"\\X?abc">>,
  709: 		   [unicode,{capture,none}]),
  710:     ok.
  711: 
  712: %% Check correct handling of dupnames option to re.
  713: opt_dupnames(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  714:     Days = ["Monday","Tuesday","Wednesday","Thursday","Friday","Saturday","Sunday"],
  715:     _ = [ begin
  716: 	      Short = lists:sublist(Day,3),
  717: 	      {match,[Short]} =
  718: 		  re:run(Day,
  719: 			 "(?<DN>Mon|Fri|Sun)(?:day)?|(?<DN>Tue)(?:sday)?|"
  720: 			 "(?<DN>Wed)(?:nesday)?|(?<DN>Thu)(?:rsday)?|"
  721: 			 "(?<DN>Sat)(?:urday)?",
  722: 			 [dupnames, {capture, ['DN'], list}])
  723: 	  end || Day <- Days ],
  724:     _ = [ begin
  725: 	      Short = list_to_binary(lists:sublist(Day,3)),
  726: 	      {match,[Short]} =
  727: 		  re:run(Day,
  728: 			 "(?<DN>Mon|Fri|Sun)(?:day)?|(?<DN>Tue)(?:sday)?|"
  729: 			 "(?<DN>Wed)(?:nesday)?|(?<DN>Thu)(?:rsday)?|"
  730: 			 "(?<DN>Sat)(?:urday)?",
  731: 			 [dupnames, {capture, ['DN'], binary}])
  732: 	  end || Day <- Days ],
  733:     _ = [ begin
  734: 	      {match,[{0,3}]} =
  735: 		  re:run(Day,
  736: 			 "(?<DN>Mon|Fri|Sun)(?:day)?|(?<DN>Tue)(?:sday)?|"
  737: 			 "(?<DN>Wed)(?:nesday)?|(?<DN>Thu)(?:rsday)?|"
  738: 			 "(?<DN>Sat)(?:urday)?",
  739: 			 [dupnames, {capture, ['DN'], index}])
  740: 	  end || Day <- Days ],
  741:     {match,[{0,1},{1,3},{7,1}]} = re:run("SMondayX","(?<Skrap>.)(?<DN>Mon|Fri|Sun)(?:day)?(?<Skrap2>.)|"
  742: 					 "(?<DN>Tue)(?:sday)?|(?<DN>Wed)nesday|(?<DN>Thu)(?:rsday)?|"
  743: 					 "(?<DN>Sat)(?:urday)?",
  744: 					 [dupnames, {capture, ['Skrap','DN','Skrap2'],index}]),
  745:     {match,[{-1,0},{0,3},{-1,0}]} = re:run("Wednesday","(?<Skrap>.)(?<DN>Mon|Fri|Sun)(?:day)?(?<Skrap2>.)|"
  746: 					   "(?<DN>Tue)(?:sday)?|(?<DN>Wed)nesday|(?<DN>Thu)(?:rsday)?|"
  747: 					   "(?<DN>Sat)(?:urday)?",
  748: 					   [dupnames, {capture, ['Skrap','DN','Skrap2'],index}]),
  749:     nomatch = re:run("Wednsday","(?<Skrap>.)(?<DN>Mon|Fri|Sun)(?:day)?(?<Skrap2>.)|"
  750: 		     "(?<DN>Tue)(?:sday)?|(?<DN>Wed)nesday|(?<DN>Thu)(?:rsday)?|"
  751: 		     "(?<DN>Sat)(?:urday)?",
  752: 		     [dupnames, {capture, ['Skrap','DN','Skrap2'],index}]),
  753:     {match,[<<>>]} = re:run("Subject","b",[dupnames,{capture,['B'],binary}]),
  754:     {match,[<<"S">>,<<"u">>,<<"b">>,<<"j">>,<<"e">>,<<"c">>,
  755: 	    <<"t">>,<<"I">>,<<"s">>,<<"M">>,<<"o">>,<<"r">>,<<"e">>,
  756: 	    <<"T">>,<<"h">>,<<"a">>,<<"n">>,<<"T">>,<<"e">>,<<"n">>]} =
  757: 	re:run("SubjectIsMoreThanTen",
  758: 	       "(?<S>S)(?<u>u)(?<b>b)(?<j>j)(?<e>e)(?<c>c)(?<t>t)"
  759: 	       "(?<I>I)(?<s>s)(?<M>M)(?<o>o)(?<r>r)(?<e>e)(?<T>T)"
  760: 	       "(?<h>h)(?<a>a)(?<n>n)(?<T>T)(?<e>e)(?<n>n)",
  761: 	       [dupnames,{capture,['S','u','b','j','e','c','t',
  762: 				   'I','s','M','o','r','e','T',
  763: 				   'h','a','n','T','e','n'],binary}]),
  764:     {match,[<<"S">>,<<"u">>,<<"b">>,<<"j">>,<<"e">>,<<"c">>,
  765: 	    <<"t">>,<<"I">>,<<"s">>,<<"M">>,<<"o">>,<<"r">>,<<"e">>,
  766: 	    <<"T">>,<<"h">>,<<"a">>,<<"n">>,<<"T">>,<<"e">>,<<"n">>]} =
  767: 	re:run("SubjectIsMoreThanTen",
  768: 	       "(?<S>S)(?<u>u)(?<b>b)(?<j>j)(?<e>e)(?<c>c)(?<t>t)"
  769: 	       "(?<I>I)(?<s>s)(?<M>M)(?<o>o)(?<r>r)(?<e>e)(?<T>T)"
  770: 	       "(?<h>h)(?<a>a)(?<n>n)(?<T>T)(?<e>e)(?<n>n)",
  771: 	       [dupnames,
  772: 		{capture,all_but_first,list},
  773: 		{capture,['S','u','b','j','e','c','t',
  774: 			  'I','s','M','o','r','e','T',
  775: 			  'h','a','n','T','e','n'],binary}]),
  776:     {match,[<<"S">>,<<"u">>,<<"b">>,<<"j">>,<<"e">>,<<"c">>,
  777: 	    <<"t">>,<<"I">>,<<"s">>,<<"M">>,<<"o">>,<<"r">>,<<"e">>,
  778: 	    <<"T">>,<<"h">>,<<"a">>,<<"n">>,<<"T">>,<<"e">>,<<"n">>]} =
  779: 	re:run("SubjectIsMoreThanTen",
  780: 	       "(?<S>S)(?<u>u)(?<b>b)(?<j>j)(?<e>e)(?<c>c)(?<t>t)"
  781: 	       "(?<I>I)(?<s>s)(?<M>M)(?<o>o)(?<r>r)(?<e>e)(?<T>T)"
  782: 	       "(?<h>h)(?<a>a)(?<n>n)(?<T>T)(?<e>e)(?<n>n)",
  783: 	       [dupnames,
  784: 		{capture,["S","u","b","j","e","c","t",
  785: 			  "I","s","M","o","r","e","T",
  786: 			  "h","a","n","T","e","n"],binary}]), 
  787:     {match,[<<"S">>,<<"u">>,<<"b">>,<<"j">>,<<"e">>,<<"c">>,
  788: 	    <<"t">>,<<"I">>,<<"s">>,<<"M">>,<<"o">>,<<"r">>,<<"e">>,
  789: 	    <<"T">>,<<"h">>,<<"a">>,<<"n">>,<<"T">>,<<"e">>,<<"n">>]} =
  790: 	re:run("SubjectIsMoreThanTen",
  791: 	       "(?<S>S)(?<u>u)(?<b>b)(?<j>j)(?<e>e)(?<c>c)(?<t>t)"
  792: 	       "(?<I>I)(?<s>s)(?<M>M)(?<o>o)(?<r>r)(?<e>e)(?<T>T)"
  793: 	       "(?<h>h)(?<a>a)(?<n>n)(?<T>T)(?<e>e)(?<then>n)",
  794: 	       [dupnames,
  795: 		{capture,["S","u","b","j","e","c","t",
  796: 			  "I","s","M","o","r","e","T",
  797: 			  "h","a","n","T","e","then"],binary}]), 
  798:     ok.
  799: 
  800: %% Test capturing of all_names.
  801: opt_all_names(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  802:     Days = ["Monday","Tuesday","Wednesday","Thursday","Friday","Saturday","Sunday"],
  803:     {match,[{1,3},{0,1},{7,1}]} = re:run("SMondayX","(?<Skrap>.)(?<DN>Mon|Fri|Sun)(?:day)?(?<Skrap2>.)|"
  804: 					 "(?<DN>Tue)(?:sday)?|(?<DN>Wed)nesday|(?<DN>Thu)(?:rsday)?|"
  805: 					 "(?<DN>Sat)(?:urday)?",
  806: 					 [dupnames, {capture, all_names,index}]),
  807:     {match,[{0,3},{-1,0},{-1,0}]} = re:run("Wednesday","(?<Skrap>.)(?<DN>Mon|Fri|Sun)(?:day)?(?<Skrap2>.)|"
  808: 					   "(?<DN>Tue)(?:sday)?|(?<DN>Wed)nesday|(?<DN>Thu)(?:rsday)?|"
  809: 					   "(?<DN>Sat)(?:urday)?",
  810: 					   [dupnames, {capture, all_names,index}]),
  811: 
  812:     _ = [ begin
  813: 	      {match,[{0,3}]} =
  814: 		  re:run(Day,
  815: 			 "(?<DN>Mon|Fri|Sun)(?:day)?|(?<DN>Tue)(?:sday)?|"
  816: 			 "(?<DN>Wed)(?:nesday)?|(?<DN>Thu)(?:rsday)?|"
  817: 			 "(?<DN>Sat)(?:urday)?",
  818: 			 [dupnames, {capture, all_names, index}])
  819: 	  end || Day <- Days ],
  820:     _ = [ begin
  821: 	      match =
  822: 		  re:run(Day,
  823: 			 "(Mon|Fri|Sun)(?:day)?|(Tue)(?:sday)?|"
  824: 			 "(Wed)(?:nesday)?|(Thu)(?:rsday)?|"
  825: 			 "(Sat)(?:urday)?",
  826: 			 [dupnames, {capture, all_names, index}])
  827: 	  end || Day <- Days ],
  828:     {match,[{0,1},{-1,0},{-1,0}]} = re:run("A","(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<C>C)",[{capture, all_names, index}]),
  829:     {match,[{-1,0},{0,1},{-1,0}]} = re:run("B","(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<C>C)",[{capture, all_names, index}]),
  830:     {match,[{-1,0},{-1,0},{0,1}]} = re:run("C","(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<C>C)",[{capture, all_names, index}]),
  831:     {match,[<<"A">>,<<>>,<<>>]} = re:run("A","(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<C>C)",[{capture, all_names, binary}]),
  832:     {match,[<<>>,<<"B">>,<<>>]} = re:run("B","(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<C>C)",[{capture, all_names, binary}]),
  833:     {match,[<<>>,<<>>,<<"C">>]} = re:run("C","(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<C>C)",[{capture, all_names, binary}]),
  834:     {match,["A",[],[]]} = re:run("A","(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<C>C)",[{capture, all_names, list}]),
  835:     {match,[[],"B",[]]} = re:run("B","(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<C>C)",[{capture, all_names, list}]),
  836:     {match,[[],[],"C"]} = re:run("C","(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<C>C)",[{capture, all_names, list}]),
  837:     {match,[{-1,0},{-1,0},{0,1}]} = re:run("A","(?<C>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C)",[{capture, all_names, index}]),
  838:     {match,[{-1,0},{0,1},{-1,0}]} = re:run("B","(?<C>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C)",[{capture, all_names, index}]),
  839:     {match,[{0,1},{-1,0},{-1,0}]} = re:run("C","(?<C>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C)",[{capture, all_names, index}]),
  840:     {match,[<<>>,<<>>,<<"A">>]} = re:run("A","(?<C>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C)",[{capture, all_names, binary}]),
  841:     {match,[<<>>,<<>>,<<"A">>]} = re:run("A","(?<C>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C)",[{capture, all_but_first, binary},{capture, all_names, binary}]),
  842:     {match,[<<>>,<<"B">>,<<>>]} = re:run("B","(?<C>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C)",[{capture, all_names, binary}]),
  843:     {match,[<<"C">>,<<>>,<<>>]} = re:run("C","(?<C>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C)",[{capture, all_names, binary}]),
  844:     {match,[[],[],"A"]} = re:run("A","(?<C>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C)",[{capture, all_names, list}]),
  845:     {match,[[],"B",[]]} = re:run("B","(?<C>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C)",[{capture, all_names, list}]),
  846:     {match,["C",[],[]]} = re:run("C","(?<C>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C)",[{capture, all_names, list}]),
  847:     {match,[[<<>>,<<>>,<<"C">>],
  848: 	    [<<>>,<<>>,<<"C">>],
  849: 	    [<<>>,<<>>,<<"C">>]]} = re:run("CCC","(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<C>C)",
  850: 					   [global,{capture, all_names, binary}]),
  851:     {match,[[<<"C">>,<<>>],
  852: 	    [<<>>,<<"B">>],
  853: 	    [<<"C">>,<<>>]]} = re:run("CBC","(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C)",
  854: 				      [global,dupnames,{capture, all_names, binary}]),
  855:     {match,[[]]} = re:run("ABCE","(?<A>D)|(?<B>E)|(?<A>F)",[dupnames,{capture,['A'],list}]),
  856:     {match,["D"]} = re:run("ABCDE","(?<A>D)|(?<B>E)|(?<A>F)",[dupnames,{capture,['A'],list}]),
  857:     {match,["F"]} = re:run("ABCFE","(?<A>D)|(?<B>E)|(?<A>F)",[dupnames,{capture,['A'],list}]),
  858:     {match,["F",[]]} = re:run("ABCFE","(?<A>D)|(?<B>E)|(?<A>F)",[dupnames,{capture,['A','B'],list}]),
  859:     {match,[[],"E"]} = re:run("ABCE","(?<A>D)|(?<B>E)|(?<A>F)",[dupnames,{capture,['A','B'],list}]),
  860:     {match,[[],"E"]} = re:run("ABCE","(?<A>D)|(?<B>E)|(?<A>F)",[dupnames,{capture,all_names,list}]),
  861:     {match,[{-1,0},{3,1}]}  = re:run("ABCE","(?<A>D)|(?<B>E)|(?<A>F)",[dupnames,{capture,all_names,index}]),
  862:     match = re:run("Subject","b",[dupnames,{capture,all_names,binary}]),
  863:     {match,[<<"I">>,<<"M">>,<<"S">>,<<"T">>,<<"a">>,<<"b">>,              
  864: 	    <<"c">>,<<"e">>,<<"h">>,<<"j">>,<<"n">>,<<"o">>,<<"r">>,
  865: 	    <<"s">>,<<"t">>,<<"u">>]} =
  866: 	re:run("SubjectIsMoreThanTen","(?<S>S)(?<u>u)(?<b>b)(?<j>j)"
  867: 	       "(?<e>e)(?<c>c)(?<t>t)(?<I>I)(?<s>s)(?<M>M)(?<o>o)(?<r>r)"
  868: 	       "(?<e>e)(?<T>T)(?<h>h)(?<a>a)(?<n>n)(?<T>T)(?<e>e)(?<n>n)",
  869: 	       [dupnames,{capture,all_names,binary}]),
  870:     ok.
  871: 
  872: %% Test the minimal inspect function.
  873: inspect(Config) when is_list(Config)->
  874:     {ok,MP} = re:compile("(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<C>C)."),
  875:     {namelist,[<<"A">>,<<"B">>,<<"C">>]} = re:inspect(MP,namelist),
  876:     {ok,MPD} = re:compile("(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C).",[dupnames]),
  877:     {namelist,[<<"A">>,<<"B">>]} = re:inspect(MPD,namelist),
  878:     {ok,MPN} = re:compile("(A)|(B)|(C)."),
  879:     {namelist,[]} = re:inspect(MPN,namelist),
  880:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:inspect(MPD,namelistk)),
  881:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:inspect({re_pattern,3,0,0,<<"kalle">>},namelist)),
  882:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:inspect({re_pattern,3,0,0,<<"kalle",2:2>>},namelist)),
  883:     ok.
  884: 
  885: %% Test that the no_start_optimize compilation flag works.
  886: opt_no_start_optimize(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  887:     {match, [{3,3}]} = re:run("DEFABC","(*COMMIT)ABC",[]), % Start optimization makes this result wrong!
  888:     nomatch = re:run("DEFABC","(*COMMIT)ABC",[no_start_optimize]), % This is the correct result...
  889:     ok.
  890: 
  891: %% Check that the never_utf option works.
  892: opt_never_utf(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  893:     {match,[{0,3}]} = re:run("ABC","ABC",[never_utf]),
  894:     {match,[{0,3}]} = re:run("ABC","(*UTF)ABC",[]),
  895:     {ok,_} = re:compile("(*UTF)ABC"),
  896:     {ok,_} = re:compile("(*UTF)ABC",[unicode]),
  897:     {ok,_} = re:compile("(*UTF8)ABC"),
  898:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run("ABC","ABC",[unicode,never_utf])),
  899:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run("ABC","(*UTF)ABC",[never_utf])),
  900:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run("ABC","(*UTF8)ABC",[never_utf])),
  901:     {error,_} = (catch re:compile("ABC",[unicode,never_utf])),
  902:     {error,_} = (catch re:compile("(*UTF)ABC",[never_utf])),
  903:     {error,_} = (catch re:compile("(*UTF8)ABC",[never_utf])),
  904:     ok.
  905: 
  906: %% Check that the ucp option is passed to PCRE.
  907: opt_ucp(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  908:     {match,[{0,1}]} = re:run([$a],"\\w",[unicode]),
  909:     {match,[{0,2}]} = re:run([229],"\\w",[unicode]), % Latin1 works without UCP, as we have a default 
  910:     %% Latin1 table
  911:     nomatch = re:run([1024],"\\w",[unicode]), % Latin1 word characters only, 1024 is not latin1
  912:     {match,[{0,2}]} = re:run([1024],"\\w",[unicode,ucp]), % Any Unicode word character works with 'ucp'
  913:     ok.
  914: 
  915: %% Check that the match_limit and match_limit_recursion options work.
  916: match_limit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  917:     nomatch = re:run("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",[]),
  918:     nomatch = re:run("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",[{match_limit,3000}]),
  919:     nomatch = re:run("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",[{match_limit_recursion,10}]),
  920:     nomatch = re:run("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",[report_errors]),
  921:     {error,match_limit} = re:run("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",[{match_limit,3000},
  922: 							     report_errors]),
  923:     {error,match_limit_recursion} = 
  924: 	re:run("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",[{match_limit_recursion,10},
  925: 					   report_errors]),
  926:     {error,match_limit} = re:run("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",[{match_limit,3000},
  927: 							     report_errors,global]),
  928:     {error,match_limit_recursion} = 
  929: 	re:run("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",[{match_limit_recursion,10},
  930: 					   report_errors,global]),
  931:     ["aaaaaaaaaaaaaz"] = re:split("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",
  932: 				  [{match_limit_recursion,10},{return,list}]),
  933:     ["aaaaaaaaaaaaaz"] = re:split("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",
  934: 				  [{match_limit,3000},{return,list}]),
  935:     "aaaaaaaaaaaaaz" = re:replace("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz","!",
  936: 				  [{match_limit_recursion,10},{return,list}]),
  937:     "aaaaaaaaaaaaaz" = re:replace("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz","!",
  938: 				  [{match_limit,3000},{return,list}]),
  939:     {'EXIT', {badarg,_}} = (catch re:replace("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz","!",
  940: 					     [{match_limit_recursion,-1},{return,list}])),
  941:     {'EXIT', {badarg,_}} = (catch re:replace("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz","!",
  942: 					     [{match_limit,-1},{return,list}])),
  943:     {'EXIT', {badarg,_}} = (catch re:run("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",
  944: 					 [{match_limit_recursion,-1},
  945: 					  report_errors,global])),
  946:     {'EXIT', {badarg,_}} = (catch re:run("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",
  947: 					 [{match_limit,-1},
  948: 					  report_errors,global])),
  949:     ok.
  950: %% Test that we get sub-binaries if subject is a binary and we capture
  951: %% binaries.
  952: sub_binaries(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  953:     %% The GC can auto-convert tiny sub-binaries to heap binaries, so we
  954:     %% extract large sequences to make the test more stable.
  955:     Bin = << <<I>> || I <- lists:seq(1, 4096) >>,
  956:     {match,[B,C]}=re:run(Bin,"a(.+)$",[{capture,all,binary}]),
  957:     true = byte_size(B) =/= byte_size(C),
  958:     4096 = binary:referenced_byte_size(B),
  959:     4096 = binary:referenced_byte_size(C),
  960:     {match,[D]}=re:run(Bin,"a(.+)$",[{capture,[1],binary}]),
  961:     4096 = binary:referenced_byte_size(D),
  962:     ok.
  963: 
  964: bad_utf8_subject(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  965:     %% OTP-16553: re:run() did not badarg
  966:     %% if both pattern and subject was binaries
  967:     %% even though subject contained illegal
  968:     %% utf8...
  969: 
  970:     %% OTP-19015: re:run() ended up in an infinite loop
  971:     %% if both pattern and subject was binaries and
  972:     %% subject was long enough to trigger a yield.
  973: 
  974:     nomatch = re:run(<<255,255,255>>, <<"a">>, []),
  975:     nomatch = re:run(<<255,255,255>>, "a", []),
  976:     nomatch = re:run(<<"aaa">>, <<255>>, []),
  977:     nomatch = re:run(<<"aaa">>, [255], []),
  978:     {match,[{0,1}]} = re:run(<<255,255,255>>, <<255>>, []),
  979:     {match,[{0,1}]} = re:run(<<255,255,255>>, [255], []),
  980:     [
  981:      begin
  982:          %% Badarg on illegal utf8 in subject as of OTP 23...
  983:          try
  984:              re:run(<<Prefix/binary, 255,255,255>>, <<"a">>, [unicode]),
  985:              error(unexpected)
  986:          catch
  987:              error:badarg ->
  988:                  ok
  989:          end,
  990:          try
  991:              re:run(<<Prefix/binary, 255,255,255>>, "a", [unicode]),
  992:              error(unexpected)
  993:          catch
  994:              error:badarg ->
  995:                  ok
  996:          end,
  997:          try
  998:              re:run(<<Prefix/binary, "aaa">>, <<255>>, [unicode]),
  999:              error(unexpected)
 1000:          catch
 1001:              error:badarg ->
 1002:                  ok
 1003:          end,
 1004:          nomatch = re:run(<<Prefix/binary, "aaa">>, [255], [unicode]),
 1005:          try
 1006:              re:run(<<Prefix/binary, 255,255,255>>, <<255>>, [unicode]),
 1007:              error(unexpected)
 1008:          catch
 1009:              error:badarg ->
 1010:                  ok
 1011:          end,
 1012:          try
 1013:              re:run(<<Prefix/binary, 255,255,255>>, [255], [unicode]),
 1014:              error(unexpected)
 1015:          catch
 1016:              error:badarg ->
 1017:                  ok
 1018:          end
 1019:      end || Prefix <- [<<>>, iolist_to_binary(lists:duplicate(10000, $a))]],
 1020:     ok.
 1021: 
 1022: error_info(_Config) ->
 1023:     BadRegexp = {re_pattern,0,0,0,<<"xyz">>},
 1024:     BadErr = "neither an iodata term",
 1025:     {ok,GoodRegexp} = re:compile(".*"),
 1026:     InvalidRegexp = <<"(.*))">>,
 1027:     InvalidErr = "could not parse regular expression\n.*unmatched parentheses.*",
 1028: 
 1029:     L = [{compile, [not_iodata]},
 1030:          {compile, [not_iodata, not_list],[{1,".*"},{2,".*"}]},
 1031:          {compile, [<<".*">>, [a|b]]},
 1032:          {compile, [<<".*">>, [bad_option]]},
 1033:          {compile, [{a,b}, [bad_option]],[{1,".*"},{2,".*"}]},
 1034: 
 1035:          {grun, 3},                             %Internal.
 1036: 
 1037:          {inspect,[BadRegexp, namelist]},
 1038:          {inspect,["", namelist]},
 1039:          {inspect,[GoodRegexp, 999]},
 1040:          {inspect,[GoodRegexp, bad_inspect_item]},
 1041: 
 1042:          {internal_run, 4},                     %Internal.
 1043: 
 1044:          {replace, [{a,b}, {x,y}, {z,z}],[{1,".*"},{2,".*"},{3,".*"}]},
 1045:          {replace, [{a,b}, BadRegexp, {z,z}],[{1,".*"},{2,BadErr},{3,".*"}]},
 1046:          {replace, [{a,b}, InvalidRegexp, {z,z}],[{1,".*"},{2,InvalidErr},{3,".*"}]},
 1047: 
 1048:          {replace, [{a,b}, {x,y}, {z,z}, [a|b]],[{1,".*"},{2,".*"},{3,".*"},{4,".*"}]},
 1049:          {replace, [{a,b}, BadRegexp, [bad_option]],[{1,".*"},{2,BadErr},{3,".*"}]},
 1050:          {replace, [{a,b}, InvalidRegexp, [bad_option]],[{1,".*"},{2,InvalidErr},{3,".*"}]},
 1051:          {replace, ["", "", {z,z}, not_a_list],[{3,".*"},{4,".*"}]},
 1052: 
 1053:          {run, [{a,b}, {x,y}],[{1,".*"},{2,".*"}]},
 1054:          {run, [{a,b}, ".*"]},
 1055:          {run, ["abc", {x,y}]},
 1056:          {run, ["abc", BadRegexp],[{2,BadErr}]},
 1057:          {run, ["abc", InvalidRegexp],[{2,InvalidErr}]},
 1058: 
 1059:          {run, [{a,b}, {x,y}, []],[{1,".*"},{2,".*"}]},
 1060:          {run, ["abc", BadRegexp, []],[{2,BadErr}]},
 1061:          {run, ["abc", InvalidRegexp, []],[{2,InvalidErr}]},
 1062:          {run, [{a,b}, {x,y}, [a|b]],[{1,".*"},{2,".*"},{3,".*"}]},
 1063:          {run, [{a,b}, ".*", bad_options],[{1,".*"},{3,".*"}]},
 1064:          {run, ["abc", {x,y}, [bad_option]],[{2,".*"},{3,".*"}]},
 1065:          {run, ["abc", BadRegexp, 9999],[{2,BadErr},{3,".*"}]},
 1066:          {run, ["abc", InvalidRegexp, 9999],[{2,InvalidErr},{3,".*"}]},
 1067: 
 1068:          {split, ["abc", BadRegexp],[{2,BadErr}]},
 1069:          {split, ["abc", InvalidRegexp],[{2,InvalidErr}]},
 1070:          {split, [{a,b}, ".*"]},
 1071: 
 1072:          {split, ["abc", BadRegexp, [a|b]],[{2,BadErr},{3,".*"}]},
 1073:          {split, ["abc", InvalidRegexp, [a|b]],[{2,InvalidErr},{3,".*"}]},
 1074:          {split, [{a,b}, ".*", [bad_option]]},
 1075: 
 1076:          {ucompile, 2},                         %Internal.
 1077:          {urun, 3}                              %Internal.
 1078:         ],
 1079:     error_info_lib:test_error_info(re, L).
